question.questiontext: The largest number of cassava plants has an approximate height of
Which of the following is true in blood transfusion?
question.optiona: A person of blood group AB can donate blood only to another person of blood group AB.
question.optionb: Person of blood groups A and B can donate or receive blood from each other.

question.optiond: A person of blood group O can donate only to a person of blood group O.
